TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LOC .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . Following the applicant 's arrest on DATE , on CARDINAL DATE ORG convicted the applicant of forgery and sentenced him to DATE and DATE in prison .
CARDINAL . ORG upheld both the conviction and the sentence on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's further appeal on points of law as unavailable under domestic law ( odbacio kao nedozvoljen zahtev za ispitivanje zakonitosti pravnosnažne presude ) .
CARDINAL . The applicant served his sentence in ORG ( GPE - popravni zavod u ORG ; hereinafter “ the prison ” ) .
CARDINAL . The applicant 's letter of CARDINAL DATE to ORG in LOC bore the prison stamp of the same date and registration number QUANTITY .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant 's first letter of DATE , sent to ORG on DATE , also bore the prison stamp dated DATE and registration number CARDINAL - CARDINAL/CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . In its own letter of DATE , inter alia , ORG therefore informed the applicant in NORP of the said stamp , assuming that he may not have been aware of it .

CARDINAL . NORP In his application form submitted on DATE , the applicant stated that all his mail addressed to ORG bodies or his family had to be submitted opened to the prison administration , where it was read . He alleged that this was standard practice based on the provisions of the applicable prison regulations . He also submitted that , in accordance with the said practice , all incoming mail was delivered to prisoners opened , stamped and registered . This letter did not bear any prison stamp .
CARDINAL . Finally , the above decision of ORG of DATE , which was subsequently sent to the applicant , also bore the prison stamp dated DATE and registration number CARDINAL - CARDINAL/CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was released early on parole .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is set out in the ORG 's judgment of PERSON ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE and DATE , CARDINAL DATE ) .
